entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then a few flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
